Disease.Name: ALKAPTONURIA (AKU)
Disease.Summary: rare (1:100000 - 1:1000000, 1:19000 in Slovakia) ;autosomal recessive;mutation in the homogentisate 1,2-dioxygenase gene;brown or dark colored urine was not observed in all patients; multi-system involvement with ochronotic arthropathy

symtomp.category: IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM | LABORATORY FINDINGS

symtomp.symptom: pain, bones or joints / pain bones
symtomp.category: GENERAL TOPICS | SKELATAL DEFECT | SKELETAL DEFECT
